objectives.name: Decide whether and how to set-up/adapt surveillance systems (ex: set up testing policy, case definition, lab standardization)
Assess the risk of introduction of a respiratory pathogen of pandemic/epiemic potential in Belgium
Assess the risk of spread once the pathogen of pandemic/epiemic potential is introduced in Belgium
Decide when to declare a state of emergency
Assess and prevent possible risk of reverse zoonosis
Strengthen laboratory capacity
Decide on best diagnostic tools and testing strategy to use
Inform timely policy development for surveillance and preparedness strategies
Assess the risk of pathogen spread durign a possible resurgence
Optimize surveillance and governance in preparation for the next pandemic
Strengthen epidemiological, clinical and diagnostic research capacity
Ensure timely, clear, and effective communication of health data to decision-makers during a pandemic
Effectively enable communication of research and data to the media/public
Assess medical countermeasure (drugs, vaccines, devices) availability and to stockpile?
Evaluate and prioritize healthcare service capacity (e.g. triage, ICU beds, staff deployment)?
Evaluate and optimize IPC systems in healthcare settings
Decide if medical countermeasures should be continued/scaled-back/intensified
Prioritize resources to ease the burden of the epidemic of the healthcare system
Create guidelines on needs and means for treatment (including treatment of long-term effects)
Improve availability of drugs including new, more effective ones
develop guidance for integrating emergency preparedness into routine healthcare system functions
Timely planning and adjustment of healthcare policy during the pandemic
Ensure that healthcare professionals clearly understand and can implement policy decisions
enable communication of policy decisions to the media/public
Stockpile on pharmaceutical prevention tools
Establish prevention guidelines & practices
Prepare an intervention strategy (pharmaceutical or non-pharmaceutical)
Decide if and how to adapt travel policy
Stockpile on personal protective equipment
Deploy and adapt intervention strategies in specific target group
Decide if additional response measures are needed
Decide if population mobility should be restricted and to what extent
Decide whether and how to implement social support
Decide where additional funding should be sent to  (in a situation where funding is available)?
Decide if response can be scaled back
Decide if it is the right time to shift from containment to mitigation
Support effective public health education and communication during a pandemic?
